verses.name: Joshua 1:1
verses.text: Now after the death of Moses the servant of the Lord it came to pass, that the Lord spake unto Joshua the son of Nun, Moses’ minister, saying,

verses.name: Joshua 1:2
verses.text: Moses my servant is dead; now therefore arise, go over this Jordan, thou, and all this people, unto the land which I do give to them, even to the children of Israel.

verses.name: Joshua 1:3
verses.text: Every place that the sole of your foot shall tread upon, that have I given unto you, as I said unto Moses.
